title: 0Day Ebook Pack 08-2013 OTHER
description:
0 Day EBOOK releases from scene for the month of August as many i could find.

I was not able to unzip unrar due to the number of the books .Its easy to do it yourselves just follow the instructions below.

No comic books where included as PDF scans sucks for that category. Also where epub format was found it was preferred than PDF.

Only English releases.

To Extract
First select all the zip files by dragging your mouse over them. Then unzip them to a different folder. At the new folder you will find a set of rars .Do the exact same procedure as the zips but this time select the extract here option.
That should do it. If you are having trouble with the rars upgrade your winrar to version 5.   


--------------------------------------Respect-------------------------------------
